title: More efficient disk sorting logic needed for border row values

EB: The current logic for disk sorting needs improvement, particularly when dealing with border row values. Instead of performing the sort operation directly on the disk, a more efficient approach would be to sort the data directly in memory and then write it to the disk. This would significantly improve the sorting performance.
